tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_upgrades (
  upgrade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  upgrade_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  upgrade_date DATE NOT NULL,
  protocol_version INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_upgrades (
  upgrade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgrade_name VARCHAR(255),
  upgrade_description TEXT,
  upgrade_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE protocol_changes (
  change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  change_description TEXT,
  change_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE upgrade_details (
  detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgrade_id INT,
  change_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (upgrade_id) REFERENCES blockchain_upgrades(upgrade_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES protocol_changes(change_id)
)

CREATE TABLE upgrade_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgrade_id INT,
  change_id INT,
  applied_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (upgrade_id) REFERENCES blockchain_upgrades(upgrade_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (change_id) REFERENCES protocol_changes(change_id)
)

CREATE TABLE upgrade_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgrade_id INT NOT NULL,
  protocol_id INT NOT NULL,
  network_id INT NOT NULL,
  upgrade_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (upgrade_id) REFERENCES upgrades(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (protocol_id) REFERENCES protocols(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (network_id) REFERENCES networks(id)
);
